attributes.action: Award the Ukraine with the George Cross.
attributes.background:
Like Malta’s defence during WW2. They received the George Cross. 
Can the Government recommend the Ukraine also receive the George Cross for their bravery and outstanding resistance against overwhelming odds.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
